fr.upmc.components.ports

Interface PortI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataInboundPortI, DataOutboundPortI, DataTwoWayPortI, InboundPortI, OutboundPortI, TwoWayPortI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractDataOutboundPort, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractInboundPort, AbstractOutboundPort, AbstractPort, AbstractTwoWayPort, ArrayBlockingQueueConnectionClientOutboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueueConnectionInboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueuePutClientOutboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueuePutInboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueueTakeClientOutboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueueTakeInboundPort, CountDownLatchClientOutboundPort, CountDownLatchConnectionClientOutboundPort, CountDownLatchConnectionInboundPort, CountDownLatchInboundPort, CyclicBarrierClientOutboundPort, CyclicBarrierConnectionClientOutboundPort, CyclicBarrierConnectionInboundPort, CyclicBarrierInboundPort, DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort, DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort, PairedGaugePort, RNGDataInboundPort, RNGDataOutboundPort, RNGTriggerInboundPort, SemaphoreClientOutboundPort, SemaphoreConnectionClientOutboundPort, SemaphoreConnectionInboundPort, SemaphoreInboundPort, SensorDataInboundPort, SensorDataOutboundPort, SensorSimulator.BridgeDataOutboundPort, SynchronizerManagerClientOutboundPort, SynchronizerManagerInboundPort, URIGetterOutboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort

    public interface PortI
    The interface PortI provides for a common supertype for all ports in the component model.

    Description

    In the component model, a port represent a plug through which components can be connected using connectors. On the implementation side, ports are objects through which a client component calls its provider components, and also through which a provider component is called by its client components.

    Invariant

     invariant      this.getPortURI() != null
 invariant      this.connected() =>
                  (this.getPortURI().equals(this.getClientPortURI()) ||
                      this.getPortURI().equals(this.getServerPortURI()))

    Created on : 2011-11-07

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
